function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Selection bias in online survey due to majority of respondents being women and aged 40 years.","Impact":"Inaccurate representation of population demographics and attitudes towards COVID-19.","Mitigation":"Use targeted outreach strategies to diversify respondent demographics and incentivize participation from underrepresented groups.","Technologies":"Data analysis tools for identifying and addressing selection bias in survey data.","People":"Survey respondents, researchers, public health officials.","Owner":"Research team, public health organizations, survey administrators."},{"Description":"Younger age implicated as a risk factor for non-adherence to public/social pandemic control measures.","Impact":"Increased risk of virus spread and inadequate adherence to preventive measures.","Mitigation":"Implement targeted public health campaigns and interventions to engage younger age groups in adherence to pandemic control measures.","Technologies":"Social media platforms, targeted messaging and outreach strategies, community engagement tools.","People":"Younger age groups, public health officials, community leaders.","Owner":"Public health organizations, local governments, community organizations."},{"Description":"Decreasing interest and avoidance of news about COVID-19 associated with specific demographic and psychological factors.","Impact":"Reduced awareness and vigilance regarding COVID-19, potential misinformation dissemination, and decreased adherence to public health measures.","Mitigation":"Develop tailored communication strategies and targeted information dissemination to address factors contributing to diminished interest and avoidance of COVID-19 news.","Technologies":"Data analytics for identifying trends, targeted communication platforms, and psychological support resources.","People":"General public, healthcare professionals, public health officials.","Owner":"Media outlets, public health organizations, mental health support services."}]}
